System Requirement
==================

To successfully run JMeter and Selenium, your system must meet certain hardware and software specifications. Ensuring that your environment aligns with these requirements will help prevent issues during installation and execution of tests. Below are the requirements for both JMeter and Selenium.


JMeter
-------
+---------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+
| **Software Requirements**                   | **Hardware Requirements**                    |
+=============================================+==============================================+
| OS: Windows, macOS, and Linux               | Processor: Dual-core or better               |
+---------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+
| JDK: Java 8 or above                        | RAM: At least 4 GB (8 GB or more recommended)|
+---------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+
| Web Browser: Any modern web browser         | Storage: Minimum of 500 MB free space        |
+---------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+



Selenium
--------

+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| **Software Requirements**                  | **Hardware Requirements**                |
+============================================+==========================================+
| Browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge,   | Processor: Multi-core (Intel/AMD)        |
| IE                                         |                                          |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| WebDriver for browser automation           | RAM: 4 GB (min), 8 GB (recommended)      |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| Languages: Java, Python, C#, Ruby,         | Storage: 500 MB (min), SSD recommended   |
| JavaScript                                 |                                          |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| Test Frameworks: TestNG, JUnit, Pytest,    | Network: Stable internet connection      |
| NUnit                                      |                                          |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| IDE: Eclipse, IntelliJ, PyCharm, Visual    |                                          |
| Studio                                     |                                          |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| Build Tools (optional): Maven, Gradle, pip |                                          |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| Version Control: Git                       |                                          |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
| OS: Windows, macOS, Linux                  |                                          |
+--------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------+
